attributes.action: Help the refugees of Syria by letting more refugees into the UK.
attributes.background: The people of Syria are in desperate need of our help. They're literally dying trying to flee Syria to find safety for their families. We need our government to allow more Syrian refugees into our country. Seeing dead bodies washed up on the beaches should be enough to make each of us take action.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106509

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
